title: Multiple overhead lights are out again on the approaches to the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge.  The NCDOT was to fix that problem this summer. What happened?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. The previous answer at MyReporter.com says the contract to have the lights fixed runs through September: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6148 If they're still out after then, let us know and we'll call N.C. DOT up. Thanks.
